name: A CRAZY ADVENTURE
description:
this is the full version of my demo an adventure! you play as the protagonaist, tyler, and control him while he fights off an alien invasion platformer style! this game is filled with 4th wall breaks, and occasional memes! its not complete, but i will upload as i complete more and more of the game. enjoy the game!

ps the games desighn goes from poorly made to really good as the game goes on. i will eventually have the characters point that out in game.
